## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(wkmesh)
library(wk)
library(dplyr, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
library(silicate)
g <- wk::as_wkb(inlandwaters)

system.time({

x <- edges_vctrs(g)
})


system.time({
  sc <- SC0(inlandwaters)
})

plot(sc)
(el <- edge_linestring(x))


```
